key.name: use-mouse-monitor
key.description: When enabled, the "current monitor" is the one where your mouse pointer is located. When disabled, it's the monitor with the focused window.

key.name: current-workspace-only
key.description: When enabled, Alt+Tab will only show windows from the current workspace.

key.name: prevent-focus-on-other-displays
key.summary: Keep focus on current monitor when switching workspaces
key.description: When enabled, switching workspaces will not change focus to windows on other monitors.
